Lum0x has an excellent data processing layer.
This will lead to numerous impressive datasets.
However, a utility to easily and conveniently display these datasets in frames doesn't exist.
I focused on creating a view that allows the many datasets derived from Lum0x
to be widely shared and spread.
There are Table Type and Text Type options.
Just add the desired data to the URL, and it's generated in a second.
As a reference, this frame was also created in this way.
